sentences.en: 'How I admire the gallantry of your youthful spirit, Mr. Lorry.'
sentences.cn: “ 我真佩服你老当益壮的侠义精神, 罗瑞先生. ”

sentences.en: 'I must say again that I heartily admire your gallantry and youthfulness.'
sentences.cn: “ 我必须再说一遍,我衷心佩服你老当益壮的侠义精神. ”

sentences.en: 'Say gallantry , while you are about it,'suggested Carton.
sentences.cn: “ 更会献殷勤, 只要你肯干, ”卡尔顿提醒他.

sentences.en: Even Sir Leicester's gallantry has some trouble to keep pace with her.
sentences.cn: 甚至连莱斯特爵士这样殷勤体贴的人,要想追随她的左右,也感到头痛.

sentences.en: For his gallantry he was awarded a Victoria Cross.
sentences.cn: 他因为表现英勇而荣获维多利亚十字勋章。

sentences.en: He likes to display gallantry in front of his girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢在他女友前逞英雄.

sentences.en: He was awarded a cross for gallantry in combat.
sentences.cn: 他因在战斗中表现英勇而被授予十字勋章.

sentences.en: He was awarded the Military Cross for gallantry in combat.
sentences.cn: 他因英勇战斗被授予军功十字勋章.

sentences.en: I had a theoretical reverence and homage for beauty, elegance, gallantry, fascination.
sentences.cn: 我对于美 、 文雅 、 勇敢 、 魅力,抱有一种理论上的崇敬.

sentences.en: It's that time of year again, when thoughts turn to romance and gallantry.
sentences.cn: 又到了每年的那个时候，人们又想到了风花雪月和献殷勤的男人。

sentences.en: Private Jones was awarded the Victoria Cross ( for his gallantry ).
sentences.cn: 二等兵琼斯 ( 因勇敢 ) 被授予维多利亚十字勋章.

sentences.en: There was no lack of gallantry and fortitude.
They are putting up a fight which will live forever in the story of human gallantry.
sentences.cn: 他们正在奋身作战,在人类英勇行为的历史上将永垂不朽.

sentences.en: Yet he made polite replies and murmured the correct things about Ashley's gallantry.
sentences.cn: 可是他却很有礼貌地在应酬媚兰,并喃喃地说了一些赞许艾希礼英勇的应酬话.
